if.test: schCat == 'SUBJ' and schWord != null and schWord != ''
schCat == 'CONT' and schWord != null and schWord != ''
schCat == 'REGR_NM' and schWord != null and schWord != ''
strtDt != null and strtDt != '' and endDt != null and endDt != ''

where.if: AND TO_CHAR(CRMB_T.REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN #{strtDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND #{endDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select:
/* com.innobiz.orange.web.ct.dao.CtRecMastBDao.selectCtRecMastB */
SELECT * FROM (
SELECT
* FROM (SELECT N.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT
CRMB_T.BULL_ID, CRMB_T.COMP_ID, CRMB_T.CT_ID, CRMB_T.CT_FNC_ID, CRMB_T.BULL_PID, CRMB_T.CT_FNC_ORDR, CRMB_T.REPLY_GRP_ID, CRMB_T.REPLY_ORDR, CRMB_T.REPLY_DPTH, CRMB_T.BULL_STAT_CD, CRMB_T.BULL_REZV_YN, CRMB_T.TGT_DEPT_YN, CRMB_T.TGT_USER_YN, CRMB_T.SUBJ, CRMB_T.BULL_REZV_DT, CRMB_T.BULL_EXPR_DT, CRMB_T.CONT, CRMB_T.READ_CNT, CRMB_T.PROS_CNT, CRMB_T.CONS_CNT, CRMB_T.RECMD_CNT, CRMB_T.REGR_UID, CRMB_T.REG_DT, CRMB_T.MODR_UID, CRMB_T.MOD_DT, CRMB_T.CT_FNC_LOC_STEP, CRMB_T.CT_FNC_UID, CRMB_T.CT_FNC_PID,
(SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = CRMB_T.REGR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'ko')) REGR_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = CRMB_T.MODR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'ko')) MODR_NM, ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END ATT_YN FROM CT_FILE_D WHERE REF_ID=TO_CHAR(CRMB_T.BULL_ID)
) AS ATT_YN, ( SELECT RESC_VA FROM CT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT CT_SUBJ_RESC FROM CT_ESTB_B WHERE CT_ID = CRMB_T.CT_ID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = #{langTyp, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) CT_NM, CASE WHEN CRMB_T.REG_DT > SYSDATE -1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END NEW_YN, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CT_REC_MAST_CMD_D WHERE BULL_ID = CRMB_T.BULL_ID) CMT_CNT, ( SELECT RESC_VA FROM CT_RESC_B WHERE LANG_TYP_CD = #{langTyp, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RESC_ID=( SELECT CT_FNC_SUBJ_RESC_ID FROM CT_FNC_D WHERE CT_FNC_UID = CRMB_T.CT_FNC_UID ) )FNC_NM,
FROM CT_REC_MAST_B CRMB_T
LEFT JOIN OR_USER_B U ON CRMB_T.REGR_UID = U.USER_UID LEFT JOIN OR_RESC_B R ON U.RESC_ID = R.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'ko')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY CRMB_T.BULL_ID
) N WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) WHERE RNUM > (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1) * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M

/* com.innobiz.orange.web.ct.dao.CtRecMastBDao.selectCtRecMastFileB */
SELECT * FROM (
SELECT
* FROM (SELECT N.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT
CRMB_T.BULL_ID ,CRMB_T.COMP_ID ,CRMB_T.SUBJ ,CRMB_T.READ_CNT ,CRMB_T.REGR_UID ,CRMB_T.REG_DT ,CRMB_T.CT_ID ,CRMB_T.CT_FNC_ID ,CRMB_T.CT_FNC_UID
(SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = CRMB_T.REGR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'ko')) REGR_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = CRMB_T.MODR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'ko')) MODR_NM, ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END ATT_YN FROM CT_FILE_D WHERE REF_ID=TO_CHAR(CRMB_T.BULL_ID)
) AS ATT_YN, ( SELECT RESC_VA FROM CT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT CT_SUBJ_RESC FROM CT_ESTB_B WHERE CT_ID = CRMB_T.CT_ID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = #{langTyp, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) CT_NM, CASE WHEN CRMB_T.REG_DT > SYSDATE -1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END NEW_YN, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CT_REC_MAST_CMD_D WHERE BULL_ID = CRMB_T.BULL_ID) CMT_CNT, ( SELECT RESC_VA FROM CT_RESC_B WHERE LANG_TYP_CD = #{langTyp, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RESC_ID=( SELECT CT_FNC_SUBJ_RESC_ID FROM CT_FNC_D WHERE CT_FNC_UID = CRMB_T.CT_FNC_UID ) )FNC_NM,
FROM CT_REC_MAST_B CRMB_T
LEFT JOIN OR_USER_B U ON CRMB_T.REGR_UID = U.USER_UID LEFT JOIN OR_RESC_B R ON U.RESC_ID = R.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'ko')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY CRMB_T.BULL_ID
) N WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) WHERE RNUM > (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1) * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
